tool_description: Mr.NewsAPI is simple news api for Global, india news,  tech news,  entertainment, crypto all in one.
name: MrNewsAPI
title: MrNewsAPI

api_list.name: Entertainment news
api_list.description: At this endpoint you will get all Entertainment related news. gathered from  multiple source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mrnewsapi.p.rapidapi.com/news/india/entertainment"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mrnewsapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
